data.name: VocabWord_EndOrder
data.comment: The vocab word to end the current order

data.name: VocabWord_LastPick
data.comment: Spoken command for the previous pick.

data.name: VocabWord_OrderStatus
data.comment: System Vocabulary Word to request status of an order.

data.name: VocabWord_SkipProduct
data.comment: The vocab word to skip the current product

data.name: WarehousePicking_StockCodeEntryPlaceholder
data.comment: Gray default text in entry box.

data.name: WarehousePicking_QuantityEntryPlaceholder
data.comment: Gray default text in entry box.

data.name: WorkflowFriendlyName_WarehousePicking
data.comment: Application screen text, name of workflow.

data.name: WarehousePicking_WrongCheckdigit
data.comment: Message to be displayed for wrong checkdigit

data.name: WarehousePickingConfirmQuantityWorkflowActivity_Header
data.comment: Application screen header, for checking quantity.

data.name: WarehousePickingConfirmQuantityWorkflowActivity_InitialPrompt
data.value: you said {0}, asked for {1}. Is this a short product?
data.comment: Spoken prompt asking why operator did not pick the previously asked for amount.

data.name: WarehousePickingConfirmQuantityWorkflowActivity_InitialPromptShort
data.comment: Spoken prompt asking if there are not enough of a product to fulfill the order.

data.name: WarehousePickingConfirmQuantityWorkflowActivity_Instructions
data.value: • Say or press Yes to confirm quantity\n • Say or press No if it is wrong
data.comment: Application screen text, uses formating characters /n and •

data.name: WarehousePickingReadyWorkflowActivity_CheckDigit_Spoken
data.value: The check digit pattern for this trip is One Two Three
data.comment: Spoken prompt, giving the format of the check digit.

data.name: WarehousePickingReadyWorkflowActivity_StandardTime_Spoken
data.value: Standard time for this trip is 15 minutes and 5 seconds

data.name: WarehousePickingReadyWorkflowActivity_InitialPrompt
data.value: You have {0} cases to pick in this trip

data.name: WarehousePickingLastPickWorkflowActivity_InitialPrompt
data.comment: Spoken prompt, giving number of units done and number of units remaining.

data.name: WarehousePickingWorkflowActivity_Title
data.comment: Application screen title, name of workflow.

data.name: WarehousePickingWorkflowActivity_StockCodeEntryPlaceholder
data.comment: Gray default text in entry box.

data.name: WarehousePickingWorkflowActivity_QuantityEntryPlaceholder
data.comment: Gray default text in entry box.

data.name: WarehousePickingAcknowledgeLocationWorkflowActivity_InitialPrompt
data.comment: Spoken prompt intructing operator to goto an aisle.

data.name: WarehousePickingAcknowledgeLocationWorkflowActivity_Instructions
data.value: • Go to location below\n • Say or press Ready to continue
data.comment: Application screen text, uses formating characters /n and •

data.name: WarehousePickingConfirmNoMoreWorkflowActivity_Title
data.comment: Title screen text for Warehouse Picking workflow.

data.name: WarehousePickingConfirmNoMoreWorkflowActivity_Header
data.comment: Application screen header, screen ending an order.

data.name: WarehousePickingConfirmNoMoreWorkflowActivity_Body
data.value: Are you sure you want to end your order?
data.comment: Text on screen ending an order.

data.name: WarehousePickingConfirmNoMoreWorkflowActivity_InitialPrompt
data.comment: Spoken prompt confirming an order is being ended.

data.name: WarehousePickingConfirmSkipProductWorkflowActivity_Header
data.comment: Application screen header, for the "Skip Item" screen.

data.name: WarehousePickingConfirmSkipProductWorkflowActivity_Body
data.value: Skipped items will be added to the end of the order list. Are you sure you want to skip this item now?

data.name: WarehousePickingConfirmSkipProductWorkflowActivity_InitialPrompt
data.comment: Spoken prompt for skipping an item the operator was told to get.

data.name: WarehousePickingConfirmSkipProductWorkflowActivity_Instructions
data.value: • Speak or Press Yes to skip this item\n • Speak or press No to continue

data.name: WarehousePickingConfirmSkipEnterItemWorkflowActivity_Header
data.comment: Application screen header, for the "Skip Item" screen.

data.name: WarehousePickingConfirmSkipEnterItemWorkflowActivity_Body
data.value: Skipped items will be added to the end of the order list. Are you sure you want to skip this item now?
data.comment: Spoken prompt for skipping an item the operator was told to get.

data.name: WarehousePickingConfirmSkipProductWorkflowActivity_InitialPrompt
data.comment: Spoken prompt for skipping an item the operator was told to get.

data.name: WarehousePickingConfirmSkipProductWorkflowActivity_Instructions
data.value: • Speak or Press Yes to skip this item\n • Speak or press No to continue

data.name: WarehousePickingEnterProductWorkflowActivity_Header
data.comment: Application screen header, showing remaining items and total items.

data.name: WarehousePickingEnterProductWorkflowActivity_InitialPrompt
data.comment: Spoken prompt the operator can request stating the location.

data.name: WarehousePickingEnterProductWorkflowActivity_Placeholder
data.comment: Gray default text in entry box.

data.name: WarehousePickingEnterProductWorkflowActivity_Instructions
data.value: • Locate item at slot\n • Speak or type the checkdigit
data.comment: Application screen text, uses formating characters /n and •

data.name: WarehousePickingEnterQuantityWorkflowActivity_Header
data.comment: Application screen header, showing what "pick" the user is on.

data.name: WarehousePickingEnterQuantityWorkflowActivity_InitialPrompt
data.comment: Spoken prompt stating what "pick" the user is on.

data.name: WarehousePickingEnterQuantityWorkflowActivity_ErrorPrompt
data.value: You picked the wrong quantity! Please try again. Put {0} in Order {1}
data.comment: Spoken prompt, error message used when the operator picks the wrong quantity, also giving quantity and order designation.

data.name: WarehousePickingEnterQuantityWorkflowActivity_ErrorMsg
data.value: You picked the wrong quantity! Please try again.
data.comment: Spoken prompt, error message used when the operator picks the wrong quantity.

data.name: WarehousePickingEnterQuantityWorkflowActivity_Placeholder
data.comment: Gray default text in entry box.

data.name: WarehousePickingEnterQuantityWorkflowActivity_Instructions
data.value: • Pick the quantity for item\n • Say or type picked quantity for item
data.comment: Spoken prompt stating instructions, uses formating characters /n and •

data.name: WarehousePickingOrderStatusWorkflowActivity_InfoPromptSingular
data.comment: Spoken prompt when only one pick is left.

data.name: WarehousePickingOrderStatusWorkflowActivity_InfoPromptPlural
data.comment: Spoken prompt when more than one pick is left.

data.name: WarehousePickingSubcenterWorkflowActivity_Header
data.value: • Say a number, a subcenter name, or tap a subcenter to select
data.comment: Application screen text, uses formating characters /n and •

data.name: WarehousePickingSubcenterWorkflowActivity_InitialPrompt
data.comment: What is spoken at the start of the WFA

data.name: WarehousePickingEnterLabelPrinterWorkflowActivity_Header
data.comment: Application screen header, for the label printer.

data.name: WarehousePickingEnterLabelPrinterWorkflowActivity_LabelPrinterEntryPlaceholder
data.comment: Gray default text in entry box.

data.name: WarehousePickingEnterLabelPrinterWorkflowActivity_InitialPrompt
data.comment: Spoken prompt for what label printer the operator wants to use.
